info.title: Question-Answering
info.description: The WebKnox question-answering API allows you to find answers to natural language questions. These questions can be factual such as "What is the capital of Australia" or more complex.

get.description: Find an answer to a given question.

parameters.name: answerLookup
parameters.description: Whether the answer can be looked up in a given set of answers.

parameters.name: answerSearch
parameters.description: Whether the answer can be searched on the Web. If set to true, the answer might take up to a minute to show up.

get.description: Get a short, quick answer to a simple question.

parameters.name: question
parameters.description: A question or keywords that can be answered with simple facts.
